basics.name: Adithya Pradeep
basics.label: Student
basics.summary:
Driven by a passion for physics and its tangible impact on our lives,
                I am currently an electrical and electronics grad student who aspires to work in the semiconductor industry. I envision myself not just witnessing, but actively contributing to the electronic revolution that will shape tomorrow.  I'm eager to immerse myself in the collaborative spirit of the industry, learning from seasoned professionals and contributing my own fresh perspective. I am also, an avid reader and committed to continuous growth as an engineer and person.

work.company: 2- Stage Amplifier Design, Analog Integrated Circuit Design
highlights: Created a 2-stage differential input and single-ended output amplifier in Cadence Virtuoso. Made testbenches to verify Common Mode Rejection Ratio, Output voltage swing ratio, gain and phase margin.
Calculated W/L ratio and currents flowing through each transistor from the design specifications and verified the values of gain, phase margin, slew rate and CMRR from ac analysis plots.
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk
